markdownRemark.html: The thing that stands out about the Puerto Marina Shopping Center is the beautiful view of the harbor. There are a few restaurants, jewellery shops, a small supermarket (SuperCor), a few souvenir shops and a Vietnamese nail boutique.

frontmatter.title: Puerto Marina Shopping
frontmatter.description: Puerto Marina Shopping - The thing that stands out about the Puerto Marina Shopping Center is the beautiful view of the harbor. There are a few restaurants, jewellery shops, a small supermarket (SuperCor), a few souvenir shops and a Vietnamese nail boutique.
frontmatter.address: Puerto Deportivo de Benalmadena, Av. del Puerto Deportivo, s/n, 29630 Benalmádena, Málaga
